title: Filippo Grandi
subtitle: At the “interactive dialogue” with States in the 3rd Committee of the @UN General Assembly, I assured delegates that in spite of the very politicized debate surrounding refugee and migration issues, UNHCR’s work will continue to be strictly humanitarian and non-political. pic.twitter.com/250qU2nfVO – at United Nations
